```{python}
#| label: fig-logen-dll
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "LO multiphase generation by delay-locked loop (DLL). An extension to more than four phases is straightforward."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.logic as lgc
import schemdraw.dsp as dsp

sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).idot(open=True).dot().label(r'$\text{LO}_\mathrm{in}$', 'left')
    pos1 = d.here
    elm.Line().right(d.unit)
    vg1 = dsp.VGA()
    ph1 = elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    vg2 = dsp.VGA()
    ph2 = elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    vg3 = dsp.VGA()
    ph3 = elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot()
    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2)
    vg4 = dsp.VGA()
    ph4 = elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).dot()


    d.here=pos1

    elm.Line().up(d.unit)
    elm.Arrow().right(d.unit/4)
    pd = dsp.Square().label('PD', 'center')

    elm.Line().at(ph4.end).up(d.unit*1.5)
    elm.Line().left().tox(pd.N)
    elm.Arrow().down().to(pd.N)

    elm.Line().down(d.unit/4).at(pd.S)
    l2 = elm.Line().right().tox(vg4.tune)

    elm.Line().at(vg1.tune).up().toy(l2.start).dot()
    elm.Line().at(vg2.tune).up().toy(l2.start).dot()
    elm.Line().at(vg3.tune).up().toy(l2.start).dot()
    elm.Line().at(vg4.tune).up().toy(l2.start)

    elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).at(ph1.end).dot(open=True).label(r'$\text{LO}_\mathrm{0}$', 'left')
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).at(ph2.end).dot(open=True).label(r'$\text{LO}_\mathrm{90}$', 'left')
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).at(ph3.end).dot(open=True).label(r'$\text{LO}_\mathrm{180}$', 'left')
    elm.Line().down(d.unit/2).at(ph4.end).dot(open=True).label(r'$\text{LO}_\mathrm{270}$', 'left')
```
